members.member: An individual City in our tour.
Constructor that provides the city location. "x" - X position of the city. "y" - Y position of the city.
Private copy of the location of this city.
Private copy of the distance from this city to every other city. The index in this array is the number of the city linked to.
Private copy of the list of the cities that are closest to this one.

Find the cities that are closest to this one. "numberOfCloseCities" - When creating the initial population of tours, this is a greater chance that a nearby city will be chosen for a link. This is the number of nearby cities that will be considered close.
The distance from this city to every other city.
A list of the cities that are closest to this one.
An individual link between 2 cities in a tour. This city connects to 2 other cities.
Contains the Main that starts this form.
The main entry point for the application.

member.name: M:Tsp.Tsp.makeChildren(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: Number of tours in this group.
Odds that a child will be mutated.
